workflow.name: Automate verified visitor management with email verification, badges & Slack alerts
workflow.description:
# Verified Visitor Pass Generator 


### **Overview**

Transform your visitor management process with this fully automated, enterprise-grade workflow. The Verified Visitor Pass Generator eliminates manual data entry, prevents fake registrations through email verification, and creates professional branded visitor passes in under 30 seconds.

### **What This Workflow Does**

This comprehensive automation handles the complete visitor onboarding lifecycle:

1. **Captures Visitor Data** - Receives form submissions via webhook from Jotform, Typeform, or any custom form
2. **Verifies Email Authenticity** - Uses VerifiEmail API to validate emails and block disposable/fake addresses
3. **Generates Unique IDs** - Creates visitor IDs with timestamps for tracking and security
4. **Creates QR Codes** - Generates scannable QR codes containing visitor information for fast check-in
5. **Designs Digital Passes** - Produces professional, branded visitor badges with HTML/CSS to Image
6. **Sends Email Notifications** - Delivers passes to visitors with visit details and instructions
7. **Alerts Security Team** - Posts real-time notifications to Slack with visitor details
8. **Maintains Audit Trail** - Logs all visitor data to Google Sheets for compliance and reporting

### **Key Features**

‚úÖ **Email Verification** - Blocks fake registrations (95%+ accuracy)
‚úÖ **Branded Badges** - Customizable design with logo, colors, and QR codes
‚úÖ **Instant Delivery** - Visitors receive passes within 30 seconds
‚úÖ **Real-Time Alerts** - Security team gets Slack notifications immediately
‚úÖ **Complete Audit Trail** - All visitor data logged to Google Sheets
‚úÖ **Mobile-Friendly** - Passes work on any smartphone
‚úÖ **QR Code Integration** - Fast scanning for contactless check-in
‚úÖ **Professional Templates** - HTML email templates included
‚úÖ **Error Handling** - Invalid emails automatically rejected
‚úÖ **Zero Manual Work** - 100% automated from submission to delivery

### **Perfect For**

- üè¢ Coworking spaces and shared offices
- üèõÔ∏è Corporate offices and headquarters
- üé™ Event venues and conference centers
- üè• Healthcare facilities
- üè´ Educational institutions
- üè≠ Manufacturing facilities
- üè® Hotels and hospitality venues

### **Business Impact**

**Before Automation:**
- ‚è±Ô∏è 10-15 minutes per visitor (manual process)
- üìù Manual data entry errors
- üîí No email verification
- üìä No centralized tracking
- üí∏ High labor costs

**After Automation:**
- ‚ö° 30 seconds per visitor
- ‚úÖ Zero manual work
- üîê Email verification prevents fraud
- üìà Complete analytics and reporting
- üí∞ 99% cost reduction

### **Use Cases**

**Scenario 1: Daily Office Visitors**
A coworking space receives 50 visitors daily. The workflow automatically verifies each visitor, generates professional passes, and maintains a searchable database for security compliance.

**Scenario 2: Event Registration**
A conference venue uses the workflow for event check-in. Attendees receive QR-coded passes that security scans for instant verification.

**Scenario 3: Contractor Management**
A corporate office tracks all contractor visits with automated logging, ensuring compliance with safety regulations and insurance requirements.

### **Customization Options**

**Easy Customizations:**
- Change company logo and branding colors
- Modify email templates and messaging
- Adjust badge design and layout
- Add custom visitor fields
- Update location and contact information

**Advanced Customizations:**
- Add SMS notifications (Twilio integration)
- Implement visitor pre-approval workflow
- Create recurring visitor fast-track
- Add NDA/terms acceptance step
- Integrate with access control systems
- Build visitor analytics dashboard

### **What Users Love**

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê "Reduced our visitor processing time from 10 minutes to 30 seconds. Game changer!"

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê "The email verification feature stopped all fake registrations. Security team loves it."

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê "Professional badges make our coworking space look enterprise-grade. Clients are impressed."

---

## üîß **Required Integrations & Credentials**

### **1. VerifiEmail API** (Required)
- **Setup:** Sign up at https://verifi.email and get API token

### **2. HTMLCSSToImage API** (Required)
- **Setup:** Sign up at https://htmlcsstoimg.com and get API credentials

### **3. Gmail OAuth2 or SMTP** (Required)
- **Setup:** Connect Gmail account via OAuth2 in n8n

### **4. Slack API** (Required)
- **Setup:** Create Slack app and get OAuth token

### **5. Google Sheets OAuth2** (Required)
- **Setup:** Connect Google account and create spreadsheet
---

## üéØ **Quick Start Guide**

### **Step 1: Setup Credentials**
1. Create VerifiEmail account and get API token
2. Setup HTMLCSSToImage API credentials
3. Connect Gmail account via OAuth2
4. Create Slack app and get bot token
5. Connect Google Sheets account

### **Step 2: Configure Nodes**
1. Update company name in HTML badge template
2. Replace logo in badge design (line 76 in HTML/CSS node)
3. Update email template with your contact info
4. Set Slack channel ID for notifications
5. Create Google Sheets with proper column headers

### **Step 3: Test Workflow**
1. Click "Execute Workflow" with test data
2. Verify email is sent to test address
3. Check Slack notification appears
4. Confirm data logs to Google Sheets
5. Scan QR code to verify it works

### **Step 4: Activate**
1. Toggle workflow to "Active"
2. Copy webhook URL to your form
3. Submit first real visitor registration
4. Monitor execution logs for issues

---

## üìà **Monitoring & Analytics**

Track these metrics in Google Sheets:
- Total visitors processed
- Email verification success rate
- Peak visitor hours/days
- Most common visit purposes
- Visitor company frequency
- Average processing time
- 
---

## üìÑ **License**

This workflow is provided as-is for use in your n8n instance. Feel free to modify and adapt to your needs.

---

parameters.message:
=

‚úÖ Visitor Pass Verified & Issued

Welcome to MediaJade Coworking Space

Dear {{ $('Set - Extract Form Data').item.json.visitorName }},

Great news! Your visitor pass has been verified and is now ready to use. We look forward to welcoming you to our space.

üìã Your Visit Details

Visitor ID: {{ $('Function - Generate Visitor ID & QR').item.json.visitorId }}
Visit Date: {{ $('Set - Extract Form Data').item.json.visitDateFormatted }}
Purpose: {{ $('Set - Extract Form Data').item.json.purpose }}
Company: {{ $('Set - Extract Form Data').item.json.company }}

Your Digital Visitor Pass

Please save this pass or show this email at reception

üì± How to Use Your Pass

  1. Digital: Show this email on your phone at reception
  2. QR Code: Our staff will scan your QR code for instant verification
  3. ID Check: Please bring a valid photo ID for security purposes
  4. Arrival: Check in at the reception desk on arrival

üè¢ Location & Arrival

Address: MediaJade Coworking, 123 Business Street

Reception Hours: Monday-Friday, 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM

Contact: +1 (555) 123-4567

Need to make changes? Please contact our reception team at least 24 hours before your visit.

We're excited to host you!

Best regards,
Reception Team
MediaJade Coworking Space

Contact Us

üìß reception@mediajade.com | üìû +1 (555) 123-4567

This is an automated message generated by our visitor management system.
parameters.subject: =üé´ Your Verified Visitor Pass - {{ $('Set - Extract Form Data').item.json.visitDateFormatted }}

parameters.content:
## üéØ WORKFLOW OVERVIEW

**Purpose:** Automated Verified Visitor Pass System for Coworking Spaces

**Key Benefits:**
- ‚ö° Instant visitor pass generation (30 seconds)
- üîí Email verification prevents fake entries
- üì± Digital & printable passes
- üé® Professional branded badges
- üìä Complete audit trail
- ü§ñ 100% automated workflow

**Processing Time:** ~30 seconds per visitor
**Success Rate:** 99%+ with valid emails

## üîê CREDENTIALS SETUP GUIDE

### Required Credentials (5 Total)

### 1Ô∏è‚É£ VerifiEmail API
 Go to: https://verifi.email

### 2Ô∏è‚É£ HTMLCSSToImage API
 Go to: https://htmlcsstoimg.com

### 3Ô∏è‚É£ Gmail OAuth2
 In n8n: Credentials ‚Üí Add ‚Üí Gmail OAuth2

### 4Ô∏è‚É£ Slack API
1. Go to: https://api.slack.com/apps
2. Create New App ‚Üí From scratch
3. Name: "Visitor Alerts"

### 5Ô∏è‚É£ Google Sheets OAuth2
**Setup Steps:**
1. Create spreadsheet: "Visitor Log"
2. Add headers: Timestamp, Visitor ID, Full Name, Email, Visit Date, Purpose, Company, Email Verified, Badge Image URL, Status
3. In n8n: Credentials ‚Üí Add ‚Üí Google Sheets OAuth2

## üîÑ STEP 2: EXTRACT & ORGANIZE DATA

**What It Does:**
- Extracts visitor information from nested JSON
- Combines first and last name into full name
- Formats visit date in multiple ways (ISO & display)
- Adds submission timestamp
- Creates unique submission ID
- Normalizes all field names for easy reference

## ‚úÖ STEP 3: EMAIL VERIFICATION

**What It Does:**
- Verifies email format is correct
- Checks if domain exists and has MX records
- Validates mailbox actually exists
- Detects disposable/temporary emails
- Identifies spam/risky addresses
- Returns verification status and details

## üîÄ STEP 4: VALIDATION DECISION POINT

**What It Does:**
- Checks if email verification passed
- Splits workflow into two paths:
  - ‚úÖ TRUE = Valid email ‚Üí Continue to badge generation
  - ‚ùå FALSE = Invalid email ‚Üí Stop with error

## üÜî STEP 5: GENERATE VISITOR ID & QR CODE

**What It Does:**
- Generates unique visitor ID with timestamp
- Creates QR code data with full visitor info
- Provides two QR formats (JSON & simple text)
- Generates QR code image URLs
- Adds verification timestamp

## üé® STEP 6: CREATE VISITOR BADGE IMAGE

**HTML Template Structure:**
```
‚îå‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îê
‚îÇ    [Logo] Visitor Pass      ‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î§
‚îÇ      [‚úì Photo]              ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    VISITOR NAME             ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  ID: VIS-20251103-234567    ‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î§
‚îÇ üìÖ Visit Date: 11/05/2025   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ üéØ Purpose: Meeting         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ üè¢ Company: ABC Corp        ‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î§
‚îÇ     [QR CODE IMAGE]         ‚îÇ
‚îÇ    Scan for Entry           ‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚î§
‚îÇ  ‚úì VERIFIED ENTRY           ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  MediaJade Coworking        ‚îÇ
‚îÇ  2025-11-03T14:55:30Z       ‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îò
```

## üìß STEP 7: EMAIL VISITOR PASS

**What It Does:**
- Sends professional HTML email
- Includes visitor pass badge image
- Provides visit details and instructions
- Gives location and contact info
- Confirms verification status

## üí¨ STEP 8: SLACK SECURITY ALERT

**Why Slack Notifications:**
- ‚úÖ Real-time alerts (instant)
- ‚úÖ Mobile push notifications
- ‚úÖ Team collaboration
- ‚úÖ Searchable history
- ‚úÖ No email clutter
- ‚úÖ Easy to respond/discuss
- ‚úÖ Audit trail

## üìä STEP 9: LOG TO GOOGLE SHEETS

**What It Does:**
- Appends new row to spreadsheet
- Records all visitor information
- Logs badge image URL
- Tracks verification status
- Creates searchable audit trail

**Spreadsheet Columns:**

1. **Timestamp** 
2. **Visitor ID**
3. **Full Name** 
4. **Email**
5. **Visit Date**
6. **Purpose**
7. **Company**
8. **Email Verified**
9. **Badge Image URL** 
10. **Status**

## ‚ùå STEP 4B: INVALID EMAIL HANDLING

**What It Does:**
- Terminates workflow execution
- Shows error message: "Invalid Email"
- Prevents fake visitor entries
- No badge created
- No email sent
- No resources wasted

**Error Message:**
"Invalid Email"

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
